title: Senior Game Developer
description: We are seeking a Senior Game Developer to create immersive and engaging interactive experiences. You will be responsible for implementing core gameplay mechanics, optimizing graphics performance, and integrating assets into our game engine. Your role involves working with Unity or Unreal Engine, writing high-performance C# or C++ code, and collaborating with artists and designers to bring creative visions to life. Experience with shader programming, physics engines, and multiplayer networking is highly desirable. We look for individuals who are passionate about gaming, have a strong mathematical background, and a commitment to delivering polished, high-quality user experiences.
